resources.string: Made by the Elaphant Team. Version %1$s Build %2$s
It looks like you are using a third-party keyboard, which can record what you type and steal your recovery phrase. Please switch to the default Android keyboard for extra protection.
There is a problem with your Android OS keystore, please contact support@elaphant.app
Your Elephant encrypted data was recently invalidated because your Android lock screen was disabled.
No internet connection found. Check your connection and try again.
Please enable storage permissions in your device settings: \"Settings\" > \"Apps\" > \"Elephant\" > \"Permissions\".
Any BCH in your wallet can be accessed through the home screen.
Elephant will not function properly unless screen-altering apps (such as Twilight) are disabled.
Enter a destination BCH address below. All BCH in your wallet at the time of the fork (%1$s) will be sent.
Your account does not contain any BCH, or you received BCH after the fork.
Payment Protocol Requests are not supported for BCH transactions
%1$s is requesting authentication using your bitcoin wallet
Please check with the service. You may need to try again.
Center your ID in the box
Processing time: This transaction is predicted to complete in %1$s.
The words entered do not match your recovery phrase. Please try again.
To make sure everything was written down correctly, please enter the following words from your recovery phrase.
This device isn\'t configured to send email with the iOS mail app.
Elephant can not be authenticated due to a bug in your version of Android. [Please tap here for more information.]
This device isn\'t configured to send messages.
Fingerprint not recognized. Please try again.
You can customize your Face ID spending limit from the %1$s.
Use your face to unlock your Elephant and send money up to a set limit.
You have not set up Face ID on this device. Go to Settings->Face ID & Passcode to set it up now.
This option is not recommended for time-sensitive transactions.
Send %1$s from this private key into your wallet? The bitcoin network will receive a fee of %2$s.
This private key is already in your wallet.
Transaction fees would cost more than the funds available on this private key.
Importing a wallet transfers all the money from your other wallet into your Elephant wallet using a single transaction.
This private key is password protected.
Importing a wallet does not include transaction history or other details.
DEVICE SECURITY COMPROMISED\n Any \'jailbreak\' app can access Elephant\'s keychain data and steal your bitcoin! Unlink this wallet immediately and restore on a secure device.
DEVICE SECURITY COMPROMISED\n Any \'jailbreak\' app can access Elephant\'s keychain data and steal your bitcoin. Please only use Elephant on a non-jailbroken device.
Elephant does not have permission to access location services.
Your wallet name only appears in your account transaction history and cannot be seen by anyone else.
Bitcoin transaction outputs can\'t be less than %1$s.
Tap Continue to enable Face ID
A device passcode is needed to safeguard your wallet. Go to settings and turn passcode on.
A device screen lock is needed to safeguard your wallet. Go to \"Settings\" > \"Security\" > \"Screen lock\" and enable to continue.
Your recovery phrase must be saved in case you ever lose or change your phone.
Your wallet may be out of sync. This can often be fixed by rescanning the blockchain.
Help improve Elephant by sharing your anonymous data with us
Tap Continue to enable Touch ID
Tap here to enable fingerprint authentication
Elephant has upgraded to using a 6-digit PIN. Tap Continue to upgrade.
Turn on notifications to receive special messages from Elephant in the future.
Recover your Wallet with your recovery phrase.
The recovery phrase you entered is invalid. Please double-check each word and try again.
Enter the recovery phrase for the wallet you want to recover.
To reset your PIN, enter the words from your recovery phrase into the boxes below.
You will not be able to send money while syncing.
If a transaction shows as completed on the network but not in your Elephant.
You repeatedly get an error saying your transaction was rejected.
You will not be able to send money while syncing with the blockchain.
Enable all security features for maximum protection.
The only way to access your assets if you lose or upgrade your phone.
Protects your Elephant from unauthorized users.
Conveniently unlock your Elephant and send money up to a set limit.
Elephant is not allowed to access the camera
Go to Settings to allow camera access.
Elephant is not allowed to access the camera
The destination is your own address. You cannot send to yourself.
You must have at least %1$s in your wallet in order to transfer this type of token. Would you like to go to your Ethereum wallet now?
The destination address is not a valid %1$s address.
Pasteboard does not contain a valid %1$s address.
Sending is disabled during a full rescan.
Warning: this is a legacy bitcoin address. Are you sure you want to send Bitcoin Cash to it?
Insufficient funds to cover the transaction fee.
Please enter an amount to send.
Network Fee conditions are being downloaded. Please try again.
Bitcoin addresses are intended for single use only.
Re-use reduces privacy for both you and the recipient and can result in loss if the recipient doesn\'t directly control the address.
Help improve Elephant by sharing your anonymous data with us. This does not include any financial information. We respect your financial privacy.
Your recovery phrase is the only way to restore your Elephant if your phone is lost, stolen, broken, or upgraded.\n\nWe will show you a list of words to write down on a piece of paper and keep safe.
You last wrote down your recovery phrase on %1$s
You can customize your Touch ID spending limit from the %1$s.
You can customize your Fingerprint Authentication Spending Limit from the Fingerprint Authorization Spending Limit Screen
You have not enabled fingerprint authentication on this device. Go to Settings -> Security to set up fingerprint authentication.
Use your fingerprint to unlock your Elephant and send money up to a set limit.
You have not set up Touch ID on this device. Go to Settings->Touch ID & Passcode to set it up now.
You will be asked to enter your 6-digit PIN to send any transaction over your spending limit, and every 48 hours since the last time you entered your 6-digit PIN.
Waiting to be confirmed. Some merchants require confirmation to complete a transaction. Estimated time: 1-2 hours.
Please unlock your Android device to continue.
Remember this PIN. If you forget it, you won\'t be able to access your assets.
Your PIN will be used to unlock your Elephant and send money.
Authorize to copy wallet address to clipboard
Please enter your PIN to authorize this transaction.
Please enter your PIN to continue.
Open the Elephant iPhone app to set up your wallet.
There was an error loading the content. Please try again.
Elephantwallet has changed its name to Elephant, with a brand new look and some new features.\n\nIf you need help, look for the (?) in the top right of most screens.
Are you sure you want to delete this wallet?
To start a new wallet or restore an existing wallet, you must first erase the wallet that is currently installed. To continue, enter the current wallet\'s recovery phrase.
Starting or recovering another wallet allows you to access and manage a different Elephant wallet on this device.
Your current wallet will be removed from this device. If you wish to restore it in the future, you will need to enter your recovery phrase.
Write down each word in order and store it in a safe place.
%1$s addresses are intended for single use only.
DID is the virtual personal identity in blockchain world, it is decentralized stored and secure, it can identify any thing in the real world, like person, asset, thing.

Your operation system does not support standard KeyStore technology on Android which we use to store your private key, to continue to use our app, please upgrade your operation system to Android 8.0 or later, or tap Continue to always allow our app to access your KeyStore without permission request.
-Complete your profile, build your own credits-

Applications in Explore are provided by third party vendors. Neither Elephant nor Elastos has control over the contents of any app and is not responsible for these apps, their content, or their availability.
You are going to vote %1$d nodes(36 max)
You only need to pay a little transaction fee: %1$s ELA
You can spend your ELA anytime after vote while your votes will be revoked.
Please enter your PIN to authorize this vote
Auto keep my last dpos vote using my ELA balance
ELA voting app will allow any ELA holder to vote up to 36 DPoS supernodes at a time.
Your balance is less than 1 ELA.
There are no nodes selected, please select at least one node and try again.
With the ELA red packet mini program, you can send an ELA red packet to your friends.

"New World, New Money." SWFT Blockchain is a “Next-Generation Blockchain Global Transfer Agreement.” We focus on integrating the world’s major exchanges and blockchains to effectively hedge risks and provide customers with an efficient and easy-to-use platform for cryptocurrency transfers.
There is another transaction being processed, please try again 2 minutes later.
Are you sure you want to remove this mini program?
%1$d out of %2$d keys are required to approve this spend.
is being spent in the shared wallet
You have approved the request successfully.
A shared wallet is being created.
Failed to create the wallet, since your public key is not in the approval list.
The multi-signature wallet is not created successfully yet, please try again later.
Your public key is not in the approval list, please check your public key or switch to the correct wallet.
By clicking sign, you acknowledge that you are e-signing this document using your personal signature.
Are you sure you want to remove <font color="#ff3365">%1$s</font>?
Are you sure you want to load <font color="#ff3365">%1$s</font> mini program?
Tap or pull up to load more
In order to manage a large volume of UTXOs, your transaction will be split into multiple transactions. Please refer to the transaction history for further detail.
Memo will be recorded on the blockchain
Are you sure to clear the cache?
Nickname will be stored on blockchain.
Scan the code to add me as friend.
Delete contact <font color="#ff3365">%1$s</font> and all associated chats.
Auto keep my last crc vote using my ELA balance
The sum of the votes cannot exceed 100
The number of candidates is inconsistent with the number of votes
The votes parameter should be a positive number
